obligations: subject to the legal statutes and regulations

simplified_language.original: The aforementioned agreement shall be subject to the legal statutes and regulations as stipulated in the relevant jurisdictions.
simplified_language.simplified: The agreement must follow the laws and rules of the relevant areas.

rights: any and all claims, liabilities, damages, and expenses

context.performance: arising out of or related to the performance of this contract

simplified_language.original: The party of the first part shall indemnify and hold harmless the party of the second part from any and all claims, liabilities, damages, and expenses arising out of or related to the performance of this contract.
simplified_language.simplified: The first party must protect the second party from any claims, damages, or expenses related to this contract.
